DOC.brief_summary: Collect data on the use of the Angio-Seal Evolution Device in diagnostic and interventional patient populations.
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center clinical registry is designed to collect data on the use of the Angio-Seal Evolution Device in patients who have had diagnostic and/or interventional procedures through femoral artery access. Data will be collected on a patient's initial screening through hospital discharge and 30 days post-procedure to evaluate major and minor vascular complications as defined in the protocol.
DOC.criteria: Patient is having a diagnostic and/or interventional procedure via femoral artery access. Patients who are unable to provide written informed consent.
